searchDocs.title: Config
searchDocs.content: Config This item only works when running on the client. Client A table of utility functions that can be used to speed up the process of writing repository scripts for client objects.

searchDocs.title: isButtonActivatedPlatform​
searchDocs.content: shorthand </> ClientObjects.isButtonActivatedPlatform(platform: Instance) → boolean This function is used to check if the provided Instance is a ButtonActivatedPlatform. It does so by first checking if the Instance is a BasePart, then checking if the platform's name is ButtonActivatedPlatform or has the ButtonActivated tag.

searchDocs.title: getPropertySafe​
searchDocs.content: shorthand </> Property.getPropertySafe( instance: any, property: string ) → ( any, boolean ) Safely gets a property of an object. Will return nil if the property does not exist, or if any errors occur.

searchDocs.title: setPropertySafe​
searchDocs.content: shorthand </> Property.setPropertySafe( instance: any, property: string, value: any ) → boolean Safely sets a property of an object.

searchDocs.title: assureValueType​
searchDocs.content: shorthand </> Property.assureValueType( value: unknown, default: defaultType ) → defaultType Checks if value and default are of the same type. If not, it will return the default value.

searchDocs.title: assureConfig​
searchDocs.content: shorthand </> Property.assureConfig( instance: Instance, configName: string, default: defaultType ) → defaultType Shorthand for utility.assureValueType(instance:GetAttribute(configName), default)

searchDocs.title: generateUID​
searchDocs.content: shorthand </> Functions.generateUID(curlyBraces: boolean?) → string Shorthand for HttpService:GenerateGUID(). utility.generateUID() --> 4BA80F4637244B4BBA957E28B9443DE9

searchDocs.title: tween​
searchDocs.content: shorthand </> Functions.tween( instance: Instance, config: number | typeof(Config.TWEEN_CONFIG), goal: {[string]: any}, easingStyle: Enum.EasingStyle?,-- EasingStyle easingDirection: Enum.EasingDirection?,-- EasingDirection ...: any ) → Tween  Simple tween function that handles garbage collection properly. utility.tween(part, 0.5, { Color = Color3.fromRGB(255, 0, 0) })
